author: sunny256
msg: * subversion/po/nb.po: Translated some strings.

author: gstein
msg: Add token binding to our SQLite interface.
* subversion/include/private/svn_sqlite.h:
(svn_sqlite__bindf): document new 't' format character for token
mappings. tweak the docstring for clarity.
(svn_sqlite__bind_token): new function to bind an integer value as a
tokenized word in the database
(svn_sqlite__column_token): new function to retrieve a tokenized word
from the database, as a mapped integer value
* subversion/libsvn_subr/sqlite.c:
(vbindf): parse the 't' format character and bind a token value
(svn_sqlite__bind_token): new function to bind an integer as a string
value, mapped via the token system. bound as SQLITE_STATIC since all
token maps should be 'static const' tables.
(svn_sqlite__column_text): add a comment about the cast
(svn_sqlite__column_token): new function to retrieve a word from the
database and return a mapped integer value

author: gstein
msg: Allow NULL values for WORD, though the stricter mapping functions will
throw errors.
* subversion/include/private/svn_token.h:
(): add a note about accepting NULL for the WORD parameter
* subversion/libsvn_subr/token.c:
(svn_token__from_word): return SVN_TOKEN_UNKNOWN when WORD is NULL.

author: gstein
msg: Add functions for mapping between values and strings ("tokens").
* subversion/include/private/svn_token.h:
(svn_token__to_word, svn_token__from_word_strict,
svn_token__from_word_err, svn_token__from_word,
svn_token__from_mem): new declarations
* subversion/libsvn_subr/token.c:
(svn_token__to_word, svn_token__from_word_strict,
svn_token__from_word_err, svn_token__from_word,
svn_token__from_mem): new implementations
* subversion/include/svn_error_codes.h:
(SVN_ERR_BAD_TOKEN): new error code

author: rhuijben
msg: In the update editor, switch check_tree conflicts to taking an abspath.
This are the leftovers of a patch that was partially obsoleted by r39264.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/update_editor.c
(target_entry->kind == svn_node_dir): Check for missing instead of no access
baton.
(check_tree_conflict): Update documentation and take abspath. Switch to
baton, abspath in the argument list.
(do_entry_deletion, add_directory, open_directory,
add_file, open_file): Update callers.
